weekly.title: Optimize Homepage Title Tags
weekly.description: Update homepage title tags to include primary keywords 'digital marketing agency' and location targeting

weekly.title: Create Local Business Schema
weekly.description: Implement local business schema markup with NAP information and service offerings

weekly.title: Audit Internal Link Structure
weekly.description: Review and optimize internal linking between service pages and blog content

weekly.title: Optimize Service Page Meta Descriptions
weekly.description: Rewrite meta descriptions for all service pages to improve CTR from SERP

weekly.title: Create FAQ Schema for Service Pages
weekly.description: Add FAQ schema markup to service pages to target featured snippets

weekly.title: Optimize Image Alt Text
weekly.description: Add descriptive alt text to all images focusing on target keywords

weekly.title: Set Up Google Search Console
weekly.description: Configure GSC and submit XML sitemap for better indexing

monthly.title: Comprehensive Content Audit
monthly.description: Analyze all existing content for keyword optimization opportunities and content gaps

monthly.title: Create Industry-Specific Landing Pages
monthly.description: Develop targeted landing pages for key industries like healthcare, finance, and e-commerce

monthly.title: Build Local Citation Profile
monthly.description: Create and optimize listings on major directories and local business platforms

monthly.title: Develop Link Building Strategy
monthly.description: Create outreach plan for acquiring high-quality backlinks from industry publications

monthly.title: Create Video Content Series
monthly.description: Produce educational video content targeting long-tail keywords in digital marketing

monthly.title: Implement Advanced Analytics
monthly.description: Set up enhanced e-commerce tracking and custom conversion goals
